Text: How do i burn it on disk???????????????
haallåååååååååååå..............hur har ni bränt ner det??...har testat både nero,alcohol och digital mh...mvh k

Rename the files, it must look like this:
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r02
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r03
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r04
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r05
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r06
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r07
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r08
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r09
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r10
s-sdu.001.s-sdu.001.r11
s-sdu.nfo
s-sdu.sfv

Then unrar it as usual and burn with Nero or Alcohol 120% (at lowest speed as possible, as usual with PS2 games)
I'm confused... NFO says USA but also says PAL. Is this a PAL game that has been converted to NTSC?
